text: The Sires' Produce Stakes is a Perth Racing Group 3 Thoroughbred horse race for two-year-olds, run at set weights, over a distance of 1400 metres at Ascot Racecourse, Perth, Western Australia in April. Total prizemoney is A$160,000. ==History== ===Grade=== *1911-1978 - Principal Race *1979-1990 - Group 2 *1991 onwards - Group 3 ===Venue=== * In 2005 and 2010 the race was run at Belmont Park Racecourse. ==Winners== *2020 - Watch Me Dance *2019 - Tinsnip *2018 - Lordhelpmerun *2017 - Debellatio *2016 - Whispering Brook *2015 - Showy Chloe *2014 - Prentice *2013 - Camporella *2012 - Luke's Luck *2011 - Bliss Street *2010 -
